hackathon-description-text: The OPEN SV hackathon is targeted for entrepreneurs and developers to team up and build awesome apps and accelerate innovation.
hackathon-eligibility:
Entrants must be legal residents of the United States and 18 years of age or older to enter this Contest.
Teams of up to
We will provide a platform to allow people to post their pitches and for others to form teams around them. Don’t worry if you are a team consisting of just one developer, all submissions will be judged fairly.
hackathon-requirements:
include
 create a functioning, no fluff, version 0.01 of your app.
 iOS; Mobile Web; Web; Desktop; Hardware
 
Once a Submission is submitted, the Contestant cannot make any changes or
alterations to the Submission until the judging is complete.
hackathon-rules:
Eligibility
Entrants must be legal residents of the United States and 18 years of age or older to enter this Contest.
Code/IP
Teams have full ownership of everything they build at the event.
